title: Free Music Resource - soundimage.org
author: Eric Matyas
excerpt: Hi everyone, I've got a site up with over 2500 tracks of free music, soundscapes and sound effects that can be used in commercial projects as well as...
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: Page 1 of 26 1 ← 2 3 4 5 6 → 26 Next > Hi everyone, I've got a site up with over 2500 tracks of free music, soundscapes and sound effects that can be used in commercial projects as well as non-commercial ones. It's all original...all my own stuff. All I ask is to be credited as detailed on my homepage. http://soundimage.org/ I hope the site is useful. Any and all feedback is welcome (and much appreciated.) Thanks, Eric Hi everyone, It was brought to my attention that pretty much any music on my site could potentially be game music...(not just the music on the "Fantasy/Game Music" page)...so I've gone ahead and renamed that page "Fantasy." None of the pieces have moved, though...everything is still in the same place. That said, I have some new tracks for you on the Fantasy page as well as the Drama and Upbeat pages. I hope they are helpful, Eric I've added some new pieces on the following pages: Dark/Ominous History Sci-Fi/Space Hope they are helpful, Eric Hi everyone, I've had several requests for action pieces, so I've started an "Action" page and uploaded 5 new pieces with varying styles. If there's a particular style you're interested in, let me know and I'll see what I can do. I also uploaded some new pieces on the Nature/Science page as well as the Technology page. I hope they are helpful. Thanks for all your feedback and support, Eric http://soundimage.org/ Hi everyone, I've added some new pieces on the following pages: Action Fantasy Nature/Science Sci-Fi/Space I hope they are helpful, Eric http://soundimage.org/ Cool, I'll try one out on my next project. Thanks for checking out my site. I hope you find something you can use. Eric Wow very great work Eric, will let u know in case I use it! Thanks, I appreciate it! If you all have any thoughts about tracks of mine that you'd like to use, but wish were longer, please let me know. Thanks, Eric http://soundimage.org/ Hi everyone, I've posted new pieces on the following pages: Action Fantasy Funny/Quirky/Weird As always, your feedback is welcome and much appreciated. As always, your feedback is welcome and appreciated. As always, your feedback is welcome and appreciated. Thanks, Eric http://soundimage.org/ Hi everyone, New tracks are available on the following pages: Action Fantasy Nature/Science Sci-Fi/Space I hope they are helpful. As always, any and all feedback is welcome and appreciated. Thanks, Eric http://soundimage.org/ Oh wow some of this is really good. html:
Page 1 of 26
1 ← 2 3 4 5 6 → 26 Next >
  1. Hi everyone,

    I've got a site up with over 2500 tracks of free music, soundscapes and sound effects that can be used in commercial projects as well as non-commercial ones. It's all original...all my own stuff.

    All I ask is to be credited as detailed on my homepage.

    http://soundimage.org/

    I hope the site is useful. Any and all feedback is welcome (and much appreciated.)

    Thanks,

    Eric

  2. Hi everyone,

    It was brought to my attention that pretty much any music on my site could potentially be game music...(not just the music on the "Fantasy/Game Music" page)...so I've gone ahead and renamed that page "Fantasy." None of the pieces have moved, though...everything is still in the same place.

    That said, I have some new tracks for you on the Fantasy page as well as the Drama and Upbeat pages.

    I hope they are helpful,

    Eric

  3. I've added some new pieces on the following pages:

    Dark/Ominous
    History
    Sci-Fi/Space

    Hope they are helpful,

    Eric

  4. Hi everyone,

    I've had several requests for action pieces, so I've started an "Action" page and uploaded 5 new pieces with varying styles.

    If there's a particular style you're interested in, let me know and I'll see what I can do.

    I also uploaded some new pieces on the Nature/Science page as well as the Technology page. I hope they are helpful.

    Thanks for all your feedback and support,

    Eric
    http://soundimage.org/

  5. Hi everyone,

    I've added some new pieces on the following pages:
    Action
    Fantasy
    Nature/Science
    Sci-Fi/Space

    I hope they are helpful,

    Eric
    http://soundimage.org/

  6. Cool, I'll try one out on my next project.
  7. Thanks for checking out my site. I hope you find something you can use.

    Eric

  8. Wow very great work Eric, will let u know in case I use it!
  9. Thanks, I appreciate it!

    Eric

  10. Hi everyone,

    I've posted some new tracks on the following pages:

    Sci-Fi/Space
    Quiet/Peaceful/Mellow

    I've also received a number of requests for longer pieces (in general) so I thought I'd begin creating longer versions of some of my tracks.

    If you all have any thoughts about tracks of mine that you'd like to use, but wish were longer, please let me know.

    Thanks,
    Eric
    http://soundimage.org/

  11. Hi everyone,

    I've posted new pieces on the following pages:

    Action
    Fantasy
    Funny/Quirky/Weird

    As always, your feedback is welcome and much appreciated.

    Thanks,
    Eric

  12. Hi everyone,

    I've created a bunch of new tracks and uploaded them onto the following pages:

    Drama
    Fantasy
    Sci-Fi/Space
    Nature/Science
    Urban

    I hope they are useful. As always, your feedback is welcome and appreciated.

    Thanks,
    Eric
    http://soundimage.org/

  13. Hi everyone,

    New tracks await you on the following pages:

    Fantasy
    Sci-Fi/Space
    Quiet/Peaceful/Mellow

    I hope they are useful. As always, your feedback is welcome and appreciated.

    Thanks,
    Eric
    http://soundimage.org/

  14. Hi everyone,

    New tracks are available on the following pages:

    Action
    Fantasy
    Nature/Science
    Sci-Fi/Space

    I hope they are helpful. As always, any and all feedback is welcome and appreciated.

    Thanks,
    Eric
    http://soundimage.org/

  15. Oh wow some of this is really good. Appreciate the effort as usually music is an afterthought with all the work that goes in code/art.
  16. You're very welcome. I hope you find some tracks you can use.
  17. Hi everyone,

    New tracks await you on the following pages:

    Fantasy
    Urban

    Hope they are helpful,
    Eric
    http://soundimage.org/

  18. Hi everyone,

    New tracks are available on the following pages:

    Dark/Ominous
    Fantasy
    Horror/Surreal
    Sci-Fi/Space
    Technology

    I hope they are helpful. As always, all thoughts, comments and feedback are welcome.

    Have a great week,
    Eric
    http://soundimage.org/

  19. Hi everyone,

    New tracks are available on the following pages:

    Fantasy
    Sci-Fi/Space
    Upbeat

    I'm also on Twitter now so be sure to follow me for more frequent updates.

    Have a great week,
    Eric
    http://soundimage.org/

  20. Hi everyone,

    New free tracks are waiting for you on the following pages:

    Fantasy
    Funny/Quirky/Weird
    Sci-Fi/Space
    Upbeat

    I'm also posting daily updates on Twitter as I add tracks.

    Have a great week,
    Eric
